name: Zeff
text: During Your Turn: When your opponent activates a Blocker or event, if your leader has the (East Blue) type, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your trash.

effect.text: When your opponent activates a Blocker or event, if your leader has the (East Blue) type, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your trash.
conditions: your leader has the (East Blue) type
